currencies.name: Bitcoin/USD
currencies.description: A p2p payment system that uses the unit of the same name to record transactions.

currencies.name: Ripple/USD
currencies.description: Cryptocurrency platform for payment systems focused on currency exchange transactions without chargebacks.

currencies.name: Doge/USD
currencies.description: Cryptocurrency based on Litecoin. Named after the Internet meme Doge. It was introduced on December 8, 2013.

currencies.name: Ethereum/USD
currencies.description: Cryptocurrency and platform for creating decentralized blockchain-based online services powered by smart contracts.

currencies.name: BinanceCoin/USD
currencies.description: Cryptocurrency that can be used to trade and pay fees on the Binance cryptocurrency exchange

currencies.name: Litecoin/USD
currencies.description: Fork of Bitcoin, a peer-to-peer electronic payment system using the cryptocurrency of the same name.

currencies.name: Euro/USD
currencies.description: The single currency of the European Union, introduced for cash circulation in 2002.
